miapi.ability.heavy_attack.title: Heavy Attack
miapi.ability.heavy_attack.description:
Right Click to Heavy Attack
Dealing %s times the Damage and %s blocks of Range
Right click has to be held for %s seconds

miapi.ability.area_harvest_ability.descr: Will instantly harvest all crops and replant them in area on rightclicking a crop

miapi.stat.isPiglinGold.description: Piglins will not attack you while wearing this Armor
miapi.stat.rapid_fire_crossbow.descripti: Allows you to load multiple shots into a crossbow and fire in short succession
miapi.stat.fireProof.description: This Item will not burn in Lava similar to Netherite
miapi.stat.canWalkOnSnow.description:
With these Boots you wont sink in powdered snow.
Just like Leatherboots
miapi.stat.crossbowAmmunition.descriptio:
This Weapon can be shot by a Crossbow.
This is despite the fact that its not an Arrow
miapi.stat.step_noise_cancel.description:
Normal walking wont trigger Step Noises,
like sneaking does normaly.
Sprinting and falling will still make noise.
This affects Sculk Sensors and Wardens in Vanilla
miapi.stat.nemesis.description:
By killing entities you gain a Nemesis.
The more you kill of your nemesis, the higher your bonus you get attacking it
Attacking other entities will rapidly reduce this bonus
miapi.stat.tipped.description:
Applies potion effects. Scroll to see every potion effect.
🧪: The effect applied.
⌚: The duration.
🗡: The amplifier.
🎯: The entity the effect is applied to.
miapi.stat.back_stab.description: Multiplier if the Attacker is behind the Victim
miapi.stat.crit_damage.description:
Critical Damage, acts on Crits by normal means and random critical chance
The Base for Critical hits is 1.5x Damage
miapi.stat.crit_chance.description: Chance for a Random Critical Hit
miapi.stat.flexibility.description:
The Modability of the Item
 Items with Flexibility below 0
 cant be crafted
miapi.stat.slashing.description:
Slashing Damage deals bonus dmg up to the Slashing value directly reduced by Targets Armor
 Every armor toughness point of the target reduces slashing by one
 Every 3 armor points of the target reduces slashing by one
miapi.stat.shield_break.description: Time an attack disables a Victims Shield in seconds
miapi.stat.reach.description: Distance in which blocks can be broken
miapi.stat.attack_range.description: Range modifier to interact with Entities
miapi.stat.blocking.description: Blocks %d percent of incoming Damage when blocking
miapi.stat.projectile_piercing.descripti:
Armor Piercing of the arrow
 every 5 levels it can pierce a Entity
miapi.stat.projectile_armor.description:
Specific Armor against Projectile Damage
 similar to Projectile Protection
miapi.stat.shielding_armor.description: Shield that takes damage before your hearts. Regenerates over time.
miapi.stat.mining.level.pickaxe.descript: Mining Speed and Level for Blocks like Stone
miapi.stat.mining.level.axe.description: Mining Speed and Level for Blocks like Wood
miapi.stat.mining.level.shovel.descripti: Mining Speed and Level for Blocks like Sand
miapi.stat.mining.level.hoe.description: Mining Speed and Level for Blocks like Hay Bales
miapi.stat.water_drag.description:
How fast the arrow slows underwater
 higher decreases acceleration
miapi.stat.water_gravity.description: Lets you sink faster in water
miapi.stat.air_drag.description:
How fast the arrow slows in air
 higher decreases acceleration
miapi.stat.bow_draw_time.description:
Bow Draw time
 lower is better
 is in ticks, 20 = 1 seconde
miapi.stat.fracturing.description: Fracturing increases Damage the lower the durability of the Item is
miapi.stat.immolate.description:
It Burns. Yourself, your target, everything. 
Also makes fire more tolerable
miapi.stat.leeching.description: Adds a bit of Lifesteel, is in % of damage dealt
miapi.stat.armor_toughness.description: Determines the damage reduction for each armor point
miapi.stat.elytra_glide.description: Dictates the rate of speedloss while flying horizontal without turning
miapi.stat.elytra_turn.description: How much speed is lost while turning with an elytra
miapi.stat.rocket_efficiency.description: How much boost you get from a rocket
miapi.stat.player_item_use_speed.descrip:
How much Speed you are loosing while holding right click.
0 means normal movement and 1 means no movement
miapi.stat.pillagerGuard.description: Decreases Damage taken from raid-related mobs by %d percent
miapi.stat.luminiousLearning.description: Increases Xp from Blockbreaking and Mob deaths
miapi.stat.swim_speed.description:
How fast you swim.
 0 means you cannot move
 1 is default swim Speed
miapi.stat.magic_damage.description:
Magic Damage.
Magic Damage bypasses Armor points
Protection does Protect against Magic Damage

miapi.material_property.category.handhel: Handheld Modules are all modules for Handheld Items like Swords, Tools, Bows and Crossbows
miapi.material_property.category.default: Default Modules are basic modules applicable to various items.
miapi.material_property.category.tool.de: Tool Modules are all modules for different types of tools.
miapi.material_property.category.blade.d: Blade Modules are all modules for items with blades like swords.
miapi.material_property.category.head: Head Modules
miapi.material_property.category.head.de: Head Modules are all modules for head items like helmets.
miapi.material_property.category.axe.des: Axe Modules are all modules for axes.
miapi.material_property.category.pickaxe: Pickaxe Modules are all modules for pickaxes.
Hammer Modules are all modules for hammers.
miapi.material_property.category.hoe.des: Hoe Modules are all modules for hoes.
Shovel Modules are all modules for shovels.
miapi.material_property.category.armor.d: Armor Modules are all modules for armor items.
Helmet Modules are all modules for helmets.
miapi.material_property.category.chest.d: Chest Modules are all modules for chest armor.
miapi.material_property.category.pants.d: Pants Modules are all modules for pants armor.
miapi.material_property.category.boot.de: Boots Modules are all modules for boots armor.
miapi.help.create.info.0:
First, select the "Create option" on the side.
This option is only available if there is no Item in the bottom slot.
miapi.help.create.info.1: Second, select the item type you wish to create. Depending on you addons this list may vary. Once you selected an option, you will see the normal module craft screen.
miapi.help.modify.info.0: To start, you need to put the Modular Item into the bottom left slot to modify it.
miapi.help.modify.info.1: Then, a list of modules should appear, here, select the module you wish to edit/replace.
miapi.help.modify.info.2: Once a module is selected, edit options appear on the left side. The hammer is the option to replace the module with a different one.
miapi.help.modify.info.3: In the replace option, you now can select the module you want to replace the current one with.
miapi.help.modify.info.4: Now you are in the crafting option, here you need to fill the Material requirements to be able to press the craft button to replace the module.
miapi.help.material.info.0: While replacing a module, you can hover different materials to see their effects. This also works with recipe viewers like EMI,REI or JEI.
miapi.help.material.info.1: The material icon next to the slots can be hovered and then scrolled through/shift scrolled through to see all available materials.
miapi.help.material.info.2: When no item is set into the bottom left slot, you can hover Materials (also works in recipe viewers) to see stats on the left and special properties on the right.
miapi.help.material.info.3: BE AWARE that those stats might not correctly reflect stats on the actual module as they can react to module specific stuff.
